errors.error_description: The installation guide incorrectly instructs users to install the `gribapi` library, which is deprecated and has been replaced by `eccodes`.
correction_candidates: Replace the instruction to install `gribapi` with the instruction to install `eccodes`.
Install `iris-grib` using conda (`conda install -c conda-forge iris-grib`), which automatically installs the correct `eccodes` dependency.
Remove the instruction to install `gribapi` as `pip` will handle it automatically.
Install both `gribapi` and `eccodes` for backward compatibility.
errors.golden_answer: Replace the instruction to install `gribapi` with the instruction to install `eccodes`.
